config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration is used as a parameter when creating a PersistentJournal object in the journal() method. It is passed as an argument along with other parameters to initialize the PersistentJournal object.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration is triggered whenever the journal() method is called, which depends on the logic flow of the program. The frequency of triggering depends on how often the journal() method is invoked.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration impacts the size threshold of the journal in the PersistentJournal object. It determines the maximum size limit for the journal before it triggers actions based on the size threshold.
